scripts.start:dev: concurrently "yarn workspace lucoil-backend start:dev" "yarn workspace lucoil-frontend start dev"
scripts.pull: cd ./packages/lucoil-backend ; git pull origin master ; cd ../lucoil-frontend ; git pull origin master ; cd ../..
scripts.pull:front: cd /packages/lucoil-frontend ; git pull origin master ; cd ../..
scripts.pull:back: cd $PWD/packages/lucoil-backend ; git pull origin master ; cd ../..
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "yarn workspace lucoil-backend start:prod" "yarn workspace lucoil-frontend start dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "yarn workspace luckoil-backend build" "yarn workspace luckoil-frontend build"
